definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="Entity" id="player">player</variable><variable type="Entity" id="hit_player">hit_player</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="variables_set_entity"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:player</field><value name="VAL"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">HitResult result = player.pick(5.0D, 1.0F, false);&#10;&#10;if (result.getType() == HitResult.Type.ENTITY) {&#10;    EntityHitResult entityHit = (EntityHitResult) result;&#10;    Entity target = entityHit.getEntity();&#10;&#10;    if (target instanceof Player targetPlayer) {&#10;        hit_player = targetPlayer;&#10;    }&#10;}</field><next><block type="return_entity"><value name="return"><block type="variables_get_entity"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:hit_player</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
